text: Shivani Tanksale is a Mumbai-based theatre director and actress who appears in Bollywood films and advertisements. == Filmography == === Films === Year Film Role 2008 The Other End of the Line Priya's Colleague Dil Kabaddi Sush 2009 The President Is Coming Ritu Johnson 2011 Shaitaan Amy's Mother The Dirty Picture Raadhika 2012 Talaash: The Answer Lies Within Mira Rush 2013 Inkaar Nimmi Shree Sheena 2014 Happy Ending Gauri Zed Plus Fauziya (Habib's Wife) 2015 Ek Paheli Leela Radhika 2017 Manjha Veena == References == == Other Website == * Category:Indian stage actors Category:1984 births Category:Living people
title: Shivani Tanksale
